caption:
This photograph shows a rural industrial scene featuring two men working near a large tank truck. The tank truck, which is prominent in the image, has a dark body with "MOBILE WATER" painted on its side in white lettering, suggesting it's used for transporting water. The truck is parked beside a small body of water, possibly a pond or drainage ditch, in an open field with sparse vegetation.

The two men appear to be engaged in some sort of water management activity, as one of them is handling a large hose that extends from the truck to the water body. Both are dressed in casual workwear typical of outdoor or industrial tasks.

The background consists of a flat, rural landscape with distant utility poles and another road or pathway tracing through the field, hinting at an agricultural or semi-industrial setting. The sky is clear, contributing to the visibility and brightness of the scene. 

This scene may depict environmental management or agricultural activities involving water distribution or collection in a rural area. The image captures a moment of labor and interaction with the environment in a seemingly remote location.
title: Oil waste
